Author: CraneWifee
Text: I work in restaurants and try to just stay as busy as possible to avoid this. They’ve never enforced eating breaks or anything since they usually have us eat before or after we clock in.   But then everyone is like “why do you never eat?” I just say I don’t think about it or have time.

Author: aliyah_200018
Text: yes! last night I stood up too fast collecting glasses and saw stars and blacked out for a second and smashed like 3 glasses, my co workers ran over and were asking if I was okay and I had to lie and say I'm just sick. and I was so shaky pouring drinks that even the customers were commenting on it. its truly the worst, especially cause I work for a very expensive establishment, everyone is so proper and I literally feel like a crackhead lmao
